civilopediaText.text: Photosynthesis by this giant fern plant transforms the Earth's environment. The Carboniferous created an oxygen-rich environment that cooled the Earth. Also, the fallen trees did not decompose and produced a lot of coal. And after the decomposers appeared, the hypoxic environment of the earth became decisive and encouraged the prosperity of the giant dinosaurs. But trigger a mass extinction event too. The current Earth is in good balance unless humans destroy it.

civilopediaText.text: This is a hunting base, but gives only combat bonuses. It seems that it can also be used when fighting compatriots.
Humans like to represent themselves and their communities in symbolic ways. But it would have been very difficult for the ancients. Many wishes are put in the monument that looks like a simple stone.

Until now, most primates used counterattack tactics when met predator, but with the power of civilization, we chase and hunt them down. This is the beginning of the hunt. However, this practice has brought some species closer to extinction.
